trial_type.Description: Whether the trial was congruent or incongruent

Levels.congruent: face image and word were congruent (e.g., male face with the word 'man')
Levels.incongruent: face image and word were incongruent (e.g., male face with the word 'woman')

response_accuracy.Description: Whether the response was correct, incorrect, or a miss

response_hand.Description: Which hand was used to respond

img_gender.Description: Which gender did the presented face have?

word_gender.Description: Which gender did the presented word have?
